last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wanchai, Kat and the Jaitham rescue crew make their way towards a fateful confrontation — to expose the massive conspiracy once and for all.

name: Bangkok Breaking
original_name: มหานครเมืองลวง
overview: The six-episode series is centered around the wild world of Bangkok's road rescue services and Wanchai who is newly arrived in Bangkok and must unravel a city-wide conspiracy alongside a young, upstart journalist.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Struggling to earn a living in Bangkok, a man joins an emergency rescue service and realizes he must unravel a citywide conspiracy.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Wanchai arrives in Bangkok from his hometown to reunite with his older brother, Jo. What they don't realize is that the night will end in tragedy.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An intrepid reporter aims to uncover a mysterious scandal with Wanchai's help, which leads them to the scene of a burning building in the city.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Wanchai faces someone who has a past relationship with Jo. Meanwhile, Kat must decide whether or not to expose crucial evidence to the public.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Two rival rescue teams rush to the scene of a gas pipeline explosion site — revealing some harsh truths between them.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As Kat gets closer to exposing a conspiracy within the Wattanakarn Company, Wanchai discovers the dangerous truth about Thida's relationship with Jo.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Wanchai, Kat and the Jaitham rescue crew make their way towards a fateful confrontation — to expose the massive conspiracy once and for all.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Struggling to earn a living in Bangkok, a man joins an emergency rescue service and realizes he must unravel a citywide conspiracy.
